dmca.title: DMCA ISP Notification www.fotoconnection.com /SpeakerCraft
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Notifications [mailto:notifications@netenforcers.com] 
Sent: Friday, March 30, 2007 3:37 PM
To: Abuse; Copyright; Response, Legal
Subject: FW: DMCA ISP Notification www.fotoconnection.com /SpeakerCraft

 

The subject line in the first Cease and Desist letter is incorrect.  This case is
concerning SpeakerCraft and not Onkyo.

 

 

 

 

 

3/30/2007

 

Designated Agent

ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc

George Poletes

1333 North Stemmons Freeway Suite 110

Dallas TX 75207

Re:  Unauthorized Use of Intellectual Property 

Dear Designated Agent:

 

This letter is to provide you notice pursuant to 17 U.S.C.
